Trigger.Name: Version 0.86
Trigger.Description:
===0.86 Changelog=== DNC has been added.
===Commands=== /e /opener /e /jobguide /e /rotationguide /e /endguide
/e /opener will skip all dialogue. Useful for simply practicing your rotation.
===Endwalker Progress=== Openers: All Battle Jobs. Endwalker Guides: WAR, MCH, SMN, DRK, DRG, RPR, MNK, RDM, GNB, BLM, BRD, PLD, DNC
===Troubleshooting=== Enable all Battle text in one of the in-game chat tabs. You do not need to have the Tab selected. Ensure that you have at least one text tab that displays /e aka /echo text. Echo the command to yourself by adding /e before it. Example: /e /opener Enable Borderless Windowed or Windowed Mode before entering a command. You do not need to use potions to complete openers.
===Endorse=== https://www.nexusmods.com/finalfantasy14/mods/555
===All Mods=== https://www.nexusmods.com/users/2237521?tab=user+files

Dualcast allows you to instantly cast any other Spell
and is at the core of what makes Red Mage unique.
Follow my lead and I'll explain as you progress.

Verthunder. Veraero and Verthunder also grant the most combo mana and unlock other Spells.

Verthunder and Veraero have a 50% chance of granting Verfire or Verstone respectively.
These are more potent alternatives to Jolt and also grant Dualcast like any channeled Spell.
As you may have gathered, it's a simple priority system (ignoring combo mana).
execute our true target, a Wildfire Hypercharge window... including Chainsaw!

You may have noticed that Spells add black or white mana to your Job Gauge.
Jolt grants 2 black and white mana (4 total), Verfire, Verstone grant 5 black and white
mana respectively and Verthunder, Veraero grant 6 black and white mana respectively.
Fortunately you only need 50 of each to execute a mana combo.

You need at least 50 Heat Gauge to enter Hypercharge. While Hypercharge increases the potency
of ANY single target Weaponskill by 20, you will almost always use Heat Blast in it's duration.
Heat Blast not only has a 1.5s GCD, allowing you to land 5 Heat Blasts during
Hypercharge, it reduces the Recast timer of BOTH Gauss Round AND Ricochet by 15s.
This is where you hone your fast draw.

Last but not least, the Battery Gauge. The Battery Gauge is used to summon the
Automoton Queen. The Queen will execute a series of attacks followed by 600+ potency abilities.
The more Battery Gauge you have when you summon her the more damage her final abilites will deal.
Ideally you want to summon her so her high potency attacks will land within party/raid enhancements.
That being said her total potency is linear. Summoning her twice at 50 = summoning her once at 100.

Cascade and Fountain have 50% chances to grant Silken Symmetry and Silken Flow.
These enhancements allow us to perform Reverse Cascade and Fountainfall respectively.
Reverse Cascade and Fountainfall have 50% chances to grant Fourfold Feathers.
This enhancement allows us to perform Fandance I, which similarly allows us to perform Fandance III.
The primary concept to grasp is each combo Action has a 50% chance to grant another Action.
You can execute Actions as you get them (easy) but optimally you want to save them (intermediate).
The sequence above will teach you the optimal rotation for Reverse Cascade and Fountainfall retention.
Return to the start when you reach the end of the sequence or available enhancements/actions.

Flourish is extremely straight forward. It grants us 1 Reverse Cascade and
1 Fountainfall that are independant of our core rotation but one Threefold Fan Dance.
Simply use Fandance III before Flourish to avoid a 200 potency loss.
(Flourish also grants 1 use of Fandance IV at level 86.)
Next we'll cover dance partners.
Closed Position is used to designate our dance partner but you do not need one to continue.

Finally, lets cover our dances and how they affect us and our dance partner.
Standard Step is our most frequent dance. Beginning Standard Step will
transform our actions and Step Gauge to dance steps and required steps.
Follow my lead and I'll explain as you progress.
We simply execute the required steps and Standard Finish as
highlighted/displayed. Each step will greatly increase the damage of Standard Finish.

Standard Finish grants a massive 60s 5% potency enhancement to
BOTH you and your dance partner and hits with a potency of 720.
Even though Standard Step's enhancements lasts 60s, the high potency of
Standard Finish as an attack makes executing it every 30s worthwhile!
Standard Finish also grants the Esprit enhancement which allows BOTH
your weaponskills and your partner's weaponskills to increase your Esprit gauge.
Esprit Gauge is used to execute the potent Saber Dance weaponskill.
Generate 50 Esprit Gauge and execute Saber Dance to continue.
